<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rippling Spin](/Feats.aspx?ID=7499) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=662" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=732" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Rival Academies](/Sources.aspx?ID=235) pg. 80

**Prerequisites**
[Reflective Ripple Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=7493)

**Trigger**
You’re hit by a physical melee attack by an attacker you can see that’s in reach.

**Requirements**
You’re in Reflective Ripple Stance

</column>

---

After the triggering attack is done, [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=2304). You must end this Step within the attacker’s reach. Then, you can attempt an Athletics check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383) or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382) the attacker.
name: Rippling Spin
